00041 namespace OpenMM {
00042 
00043 class Context;
00044 class ContextImpl;
00045 
00054 class OPENMM_EXPORT Integrator {
00055 public:
00056     virtual ~Integrator() {
00057     }
00064     double getStepSize() const {
00065         return stepSize;
00066     }
00073     void setStepSize(double size) {
00074         stepSize = size;
00075     }
00079     double getConstraintTolerance() const {
00080         return constraintTol;
00081     }
00085     void setConstraintTolerance(double tol) {
00086         constraintTol = tol;
00087     }
00093     virtual void step(int steps) = 0;
00094 protected:
00095     friend class ContextImpl;
00101     virtual void initialize(ContextImpl& context) = 0;
00105     virtual std::vector<std::string> getKernelNames() = 0;
00115     virtual void stateChanged(State::DataType changed) {
00116     }
00117 private:
00118     double stepSize, constraintTol;
00119 };
